keyword.name: AltCats
keyword.desc: Returns a list of alternative categories for this product, the main being the first. (Reference link)

keyword.name: AND
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: AtLeast
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value or the specified minimum value, whichever is greater. (Reference link)

keyword.name: AtLeast
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value or the specified minimum value, whichever is greater. (Reference link)

keyword.name: AtMost
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value or the specified maximum value, whichever is smaller. (Reference link)

keyword.name: AtMost
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value or the specified maximum value, whichever is smaller. (Reference link)

keyword.name: BestImage
keyword.desc: Returns the best image for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: BestImages
keyword.desc: Returns a list of images for this product sorted from best to worst. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Body
keyword.desc: Returns the body of this spec line. (Reference link)

keyword.name: BoxContents
keyword.desc:
Returns the (manufacturer's) list of box contents for this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: Key selling points are in bullet form.

keyword.name: Brand
keyword.desc: Returns the brand of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Brand
keyword.desc: Returns the brand of this product (Reference link)

keyword.name: BulletFeatures
keyword.desc:
Generates product bullet points aggressively. (Reference link)

Remarks: This is useful when a minimum number of bullet points absolutely neets to be met.

keyword.name: CASE
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: CAT
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: CategoryCode
keyword.desc: Returns the category code of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: CategoryCode
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: CategoryCodes
keyword.desc: Returns the category codes of these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: CategoryKey
keyword.desc: Returns the category key of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: CategoryKeys
keyword.desc: Returns the category keys of these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: COALESCE
keyword.desc: Coalescing returns the first value from a separated list of values that is not null.

keyword.name: Colors
keyword.desc:
Gets a list of standardized color names. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this to test the product color in expressions, but prefer the InvariantColors alternative.

keyword.name: CompatibleProducts
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Count
keyword.desc:
Returns the number of values in this this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: This returns 1 if this contains a single value, 2 if this contains two values, etc...

keyword.name: Count
keyword.desc:
Returns the number of values in this this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: This returns 1 if this contains a single value, 2 if this contains two values, etc...

keyword.name: Count
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Count
keyword.desc: Returns the number of elements in this list. (Reference link)

keyword.name: CustomerPn
keyword.desc:
Returns the customer partnumber of this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: This may not always be available.

keyword.name: CustomerPns
keyword.desc: Returns the customer partnumbers of these related products, for the given customer id. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Day
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: DC
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: DECODE
keyword.desc: Decodes HTML encoding, and replacing for instance ">" with ">"

keyword.name: Description
keyword.desc: Return the description of this content. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Description
keyword.desc:
Returns our standardized description for this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: This description is unique.

keyword.name: DiscardNulls
keyword.desc: Discards empty results from matched repeating attributes. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Distinct
keyword.desc: Returns a new list with all the elements from this list, removing duplicates. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ELSE
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: END
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Erase
keyword.desc: Returns the text value of each element without any occurrences of the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Erase
keyword.desc: Returns this string without any occurrences of the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Erase
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value without any occurrences of the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: EraseTextSurroundedBy
keyword.desc:
Returns the text value of each element without any text that is surrounded by the specified characters in the original string. (Reference link)

Remarks: The parameters 'surroundingCharacters' must contain an even number of characters.

keyword.name: EraseTextSurroundedBy
keyword.desc:
Returns this string without any text that is surrounded by the specified characters in the original string. (Reference link)

Remarks: The parameters 'surroundingCharacters' must contain an even number of characters.

keyword.name: EraseTextSurroundedBy
keyword.desc:
Returns this numeric value without any text that is surrounded by the specified characters in the original string. (Reference link)

Remarks: The parameters 'surroundingCharacters' must contain an even number of characters.

keyword.name: ES
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: ExtractDecimals
keyword.desc:
Attempts to extract all the decimal numbers from the text value of each element. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return 0 on empty values, but will return nothing on non-empty text values that contain no decimals.

keyword.name: ExtractDecimals
keyword.desc:
Attempts to extract all the decimal numbers from this string. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return 0 on empty values, but will return nothing on non-empty text values that contain no decimals.

keyword.name: ExtractDecimals
keyword.desc:
Attempts to extract all the decimal numbers from this numeric value. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return 0 on empty values, but will return nothing on non-empty text values that contain no decimals.

keyword.name: FancyColors
keyword.desc:
Gets a list of colors as described by the manufacturer. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when exporting values describing the product to the consumer (i.e. as part of the product title, or a color description for the user), but not for testing product color or to export raw data to be fed into third party systems.

keyword.name: First
keyword.desc: Returns the first element from this list, null if list is empty. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Flatten
keyword.desc: Converts to text and merges all the text in this list, inserting the specified separator between each element. (Reference link)

keyword.name: FlattenWithAnd
keyword.desc: Converts to text and merges all the text in this list, with gramatically correct separators. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Format
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Format
keyword.desc: Calls ToString() with the specified literalFormat on each element of this list, returning a list with the results. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Generator
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: GetAncestry
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: GetDateTime
keyword.desc:
Returns the current time with the specified hour offset. (Reference link)

Remarks: For more info on the DateTime object, go to https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.datetime.aspx.

keyword.name: GetDescendants
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: GetFullColorDescription
keyword.desc: Gets a full color description of a product, including trademark color and CNET standardized color, but avoiding repetition. (Reference link)

keyword.name: GetLine
keyword.desc: Returns the specified line of these specs. (Reference link)

keyword.name: GetLineBody
keyword.desc: Returns the body of specified line of these specs. (Reference link)

keyword.name: GetLines
keyword.desc: Returns the specified number of lines skipping the (Reference link)

keyword.name: GetPath
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: GroupName
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of the attribute group this attribute belongs to. (Reference link)

Remarks: This should generally not be exported.

keyword.name: GroupName
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of the attribute group this multi-valued attribute belongs to. (Reference link)

Remarks: This should generally not be exported.

keyword.name: GroupName
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of the attribute group this repeating attribute belongs to. (Reference link)

Remarks: This should generally not be exported.

keyword.name: Gtin
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: HasText
keyword.desc:
Indicates whether the text value of each element contains any visible text. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return false for strings containing only blank characters such as whitespaces, tabs and line breaks.

keyword.name: HasText
keyword.desc:
Indicates whether this string contains any visible text. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return false for strings containing only blank characters such as whitespaces, tabs and line breaks.

keyword.name: HasText
keyword.desc:
Indicates whether this numeric value contains any visible text. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return false for strings containing only blank characters such as whitespaces, tabs and line breaks.

keyword.name: HasValue
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: HasValue
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Header
keyword.desc: Returns the header of this spec line. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Height
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: HtmlEncode
keyword.desc: Encodes the content of the text value of each element so it can be safely placed within html tags. (Reference link)

keyword.name: HtmlEncode
keyword.desc: Encodes the content of this string so it can be safely placed within html tags. (Reference link)

keyword.name: HtmlEncode
keyword.desc: Encodes the content of this numeric value so it can be safely placed within html tags. (Reference link)

keyword.name: IF
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: IfLike
keyword.desc:
Returns the specified replacement text if the text value of each element matches the specified pattern. (Reference link)

Remarks: Pattern accepts % wildcards.

keyword.name: IfLike
keyword.desc:
Returns the specified replacement text if this string matches the specified pattern. (Reference link)

Remarks: Pattern accepts % wildcards.

keyword.name: IfLike
keyword.desc:
Returns the specified replacement text if this numeric value matches the specified pattern. (Reference link)

Remarks: Pattern accepts % wildcards.

keyword.name: IfLongerThan
keyword.desc: Returns the specified replacement text if the text value of each element is longer than the specified length, returns the original string otherwise. (Reference link)

keyword.name: IfLongerThan
keyword.desc: Returns the specified replacement text if this string is longer than the specified length, returns the original string otherwise. (Reference link)

keyword.name: IfLongerThan
keyword.desc: Returns the specified replacement text if this numeric value is longer than the specified length, returns the original string otherwise. (Reference link)

keyword.name: IN
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Invariant
keyword.desc:
Returns the invariant (english) value of this attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when testing the value in an expression.

keyword.name: Invariant
keyword.desc:
Returns the invariant (english) value of this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when testing the value in an expression.

keyword.name: Invariant
keyword.desc:
Returns the invariant (english) value of this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when testing the value in an expression.

keyword.name: InvariantColors
keyword.desc:
Gets a list of standardized color names, in US English. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this to test the product color in expressions.

keyword.name: InvariantUnit
keyword.desc:
Returns the invariant (english) unit of this attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when testing the unit in an expression.

keyword.name: InvariantUnit
keyword.desc:
Returns the invariant (english) unit of this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when testing the unit in an expression.

keyword.name: InvariantUnit
keyword.desc:
Returns the invariant (english) unit of this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use this when testing the unit in an expression.

keyword.name: InvariantValues
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the invariant values in this attribute grouping. (Reference link)

Remarks: Values are separated by ¬ according to their index, i.e. value1¬value2¬¬value3

keyword.name: InvariantValues
keyword.desc: Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the invariant values in this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

keyword.name: InvariantValues
keyword.desc: Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the invariant values in this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

keyword.name: IS
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: IsBiggerThan
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: IsDescendantOf
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: IsEmpty
keyword.desc:
Indicates whether the text value of each element is void of any visible text. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return true for strings containing text that is only blank characters such as whitespaces, tabs and line breaks.

keyword.name: IsEmpty
keyword.desc:
Indicates whether this string is void of any visible text. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return true for strings containing text that is only blank characters such as whitespaces, tabs and line breaks.

keyword.name: IsEmpty
keyword.desc:
Indicates whether this numeric value is void of any visible text. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will return true for strings containing text that is only blank characters such as whitespaces, tabs and line breaks.

keyword.name: ItemName
keyword.desc:
Returns a concatenation of the product line, model name (without partnumber) and product type for this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: Do not use this.

keyword.name: Key
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: KeySellingPoints
keyword.desc:
Returns the (manufacturer's) key selling points for this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: Key selling points are in bullet form.

keyword.name: Keywords
keyword.desc: Returns a list of search keywords for this product, including brand, manufacturer, product line, model name and product type. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Ksp
keyword.desc: Same as KeySellingPoints (Reference link)

keyword.name: Last
keyword.desc: Returns the last element from this list, null if list is empty. (Reference link)

keyword.name: LaunchDate
keyword.desc: The estimated launch date of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Length
keyword.desc: Indicates the number of characters in a String. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Length
keyword.desc: Indicates the number of characters in a String. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Length
keyword.desc: Indicates the number of characters in a String. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Length

keyword.name: LIKE
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: LineCount
keyword.desc: Returns the number of lines in these specs. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ListPaths
keyword.desc: Returns a string representation of this category with its full ancestry. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ListUSM
keyword.desc: This will list the values of this attribute grouping in US metrics using the specified inner and outer separators. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Main
keyword.desc: Returns the main alternative category of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Manufacturer
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer name of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Manufacturer
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of the manufacturer of this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: This is not necessarily the product brand.

keyword.name: ManufacturerNames
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer names of these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: MarketingText
keyword.desc: Returns the (manufacturer's) marketing description for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Match
keyword.desc: Returns a grouping of attributes by matching this repeating attribute with all other repeating attribute in the same group. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Match
keyword.desc:
Returns a grouping of attributes by matching all the specified attribute ids, in the order they are provided. (Reference link)

Remarks: This only works if all attributes are in this group of attributes.

keyword.name: Match
keyword.desc:
Returns a grouping of attributes by matching this repeating attribute with another repeating attribute identified by the specified attribute id. (Reference link)

Remarks: This only works if both attributes are in the same group.

keyword.name: Max
keyword.desc: Returns the element from this list which has the greatest value when converted to decimal. (Reference link)

keyword.name: MimeType
keyword.desc: Returns the MIME type of this content. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Min
keyword.desc: Returns the element from this list which has the smallest value when converted to decimal. (Reference link)

keyword.name: MinMax
keyword.desc: Returns a list containing the minimum and maximum decimal values. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ModelName
keyword.desc: Returns the model name of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ModelName
keyword.desc: Returns the model name of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ModelNames
keyword.desc: Returns the model names these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Month
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: MS
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Msds
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer's Material Safety Data Sheet for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: MultiplyBy
keyword.desc: Returns the result of multiplying this numeric value with the specified factor. (Reference link)

keyword.name: MultiplyBy
keyword.desc: Returns the result of multiplying this numeric value with the specified factor. (Reference link)

keyword.name: MultiplyBy
keyword.desc: Returns the result of multiplying this numeric value with the specified factor. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Name
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Name
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of this attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: This should generally not be exported.

keyword.name: Name
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: This should generally not be exported.

keyword.name: Name
keyword.desc:
Returns the name of this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: This should generally not be exported.

keyword.name: Name
keyword.desc:
Returns our short name for this this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: This product name is minimalistic and not guaranteed to be unique.

keyword.name: Name
keyword.desc: Returns the name of this section. (Reference link)

keyword.name: NonOemAccessories
keyword.desc: Number of non-oem accessories available for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: NOT
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: NULL
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Order
keyword.desc: Returns the ordinal position of this spec line. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Package
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Package
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: PackQuantity
keyword.desc: Returns the pack quantity of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: PackQuantity
keyword.desc:
Returns the number of items included in this product's package. (Reference link)

Remarks: This is the minimum number of items that can be bought in the standard retail packaging offered by the manufacturer, it doesn't include retailer or promotional bundler.

keyword.name: ParentProducts
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: PartNumber
keyword.desc: Returns the partnumber of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: PartNumber
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer's part number for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Pluralize
keyword.desc:
Returns the text value of each element in plural form. (Reference link)

Remarks: English only.

keyword.name: Pluralize
keyword.desc:
Returns this string in plural form. (Reference link)

Remarks: English only.

keyword.name: Pluralize
keyword.desc:
Returns this numeric value in plural form. (Reference link)

Remarks: English only.

keyword.name: Postfix
keyword.desc: Returns the text value of each element postfixed with the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Postfix
keyword.desc: Returns this string postfixed with the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Postfix
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value postfixed with the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Prefix
keyword.desc: Returns the text value of each element prefixed with the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Prefix
keyword.desc: Returns this string prefixed with the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Prefix
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value prefixed with the specified text. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductFeatures
keyword.desc:
Returns the (manufacturer's) product features for this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: These are separated in paragraphs with headlines.

keyword.name: ProductId
keyword.desc: Returns the CNET product id for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductId
keyword.desc: Returns the CNET identifier of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductIds
keyword.desc: Returns the product Ids of these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductLine
keyword.desc: Returns the product line of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductLine
keyword.desc: Returns the product line of this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductLineNames
keyword.desc: Returns the product lines of these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductNames
keyword.desc: Returns the product names (product line + model name) of these related products. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductSheet
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer's product sheet for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ProductType
keyword.desc:
Returns the product type of this product. (Reference link)

Remarks: A product type is the text that would be used after a determiner, i.e. this is a *Notebook*. This is not the same as the category name, which is never in singularform.

keyword.name: QuickStartGuide
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer's quick start guide for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: RegexReplace
keyword.desc:
Returns the text value of each element in which all text that matches the specified regular expression has been replaced by the specified replacement text. (Reference link)

Remarks: Ask Luis if you suspect you need to use this.

keyword.name: RegexReplace
keyword.desc:
Returns this string in which all text that matches the specified regular expression has been replaced by the specified replacement text. (Reference link)

Remarks: Ask Luis if you suspect you need to use this.

keyword.name: RegexReplace
keyword.desc:
Returns this numeric value in which all text that matches the specified regular expression has been replaced by the specified replacement text. (Reference link)

Remarks: Ask Luis if you suspect you need to use this.

keyword.name: Replace
keyword.desc:
Returns the text value of each element in which all occurrences of the specified text have been replaced by the specified replacement text. (Reference link)

Remarks: StringComparison options specify the culture, case, and sort rules to be used when matching two strings or parts of strings.

keyword.name: Replace
keyword.desc:
Returns this string in which all occurrences of the specified text have been replaced by the specified replacement text. (Reference link)

Remarks: StringComparison options specify the culture, case, and sort rules to be used when matching two strings or parts of strings.

keyword.name: Replace
keyword.desc:
Returns this numeric value in which all occurrences of the specified text have been replaced by the specified replacement text. (Reference link)

Remarks: StringComparison options specify the culture, case, and sort rules to be used when matching two strings or parts of strings.

keyword.name: Request
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Round
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value rounded to the nearest integer value. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Round
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value rounded to the nearest integer value. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Shorten
keyword.desc:
Returns a version of the text value of each element truncated to fit the specified number of characters, appending the specified omission indicator. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will truncate at the nearest point, prioritizing paragraphs, line breaks and word breaks, in that order.

keyword.name: Shorten
keyword.desc:
Returns a version of this string truncated to fit the specified number of characters, appending the specified omission indicator. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will truncate at the nearest point, prioritizing paragraphs, line breaks and word breaks, in that order.

keyword.name: Shorten
keyword.desc:
Returns a version of this numeric value truncated to fit the specified number of characters, appending the specified omission indicator. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will truncate at the nearest point, prioritizing paragraphs, line breaks and word breaks, in that order.

keyword.name: Skip
keyword.desc: Returns all elements from this list, discarding the first specified number of elements. (Reference link)

keyword.name: SKU
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Split
keyword.desc: Returns a list of strings after splitting this string at every occurrence of the specified separator(s). (Reference link)

keyword.name: Split
keyword.desc: Returns a list of strings after splitting this numeric value at every occurrence of the specified separator(s). (Reference link)

keyword.name: Sum
keyword.desc: Returns the sum of all elements in this list when converted to decimals. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Sys
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Take
keyword.desc: Returns the first specified number of elements from this list. (Reference link)

keyword.name: THEN
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Thumbnail
keyword.desc: Returns a thumbnail sized image that illustrates this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToHtml
keyword.desc:
Converts this content to HTML, essencially discarding CDATA tags. (Reference link)

Remarks: Only works for MIME type "application/xml".

keyword.name: ToLower
keyword.desc: Returns the text value of each element converted to 'lowercase'. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToLower
keyword.desc: Returns this string converted to 'lowercase'. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToLower
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value converted to 'lowercase'. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToLowerFirstChar
keyword.desc:
Returns the text value of each element with the first letter in lower case. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will not lower the case of the first letter if the second letter is upper case.

keyword.name: ToLowerFirstChar
keyword.desc:
Returns this string with the first letter in lower case. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will not lower the case of the first letter if the second letter is upper case.

keyword.name: ToLowerFirstChar
keyword.desc:
Returns this numeric value with the first letter in lower case. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will not lower the case of the first letter if the second letter is upper case.

keyword.name: ToPlainText
keyword.desc:
Converts this content to plain text. (Reference link)

Remarks: Only works on Marketing Text, Key Selling Points or Product Features, and throws an exception for other types of content such as images.

keyword.name: ToString
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: ToString
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: ToString
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: ToString
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Total
keyword.desc: Returns the result of adding all the numeric values in this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

keyword.name: Total
keyword.desc: Returns the result of adding all the numeric values in this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToText
keyword.desc:
Returns a text representation of this string, and accepts formatting options (Reference link)

Remarks: Formatting options include the ones described here

keyword.name: ToText
keyword.desc:
Returns a text representation of the text value of each element, and accepts formatting options (Reference link)

Remarks: Formatting options include the ones described here

keyword.name: ToText
keyword.desc:
Returns a text representation of this string, and accepts formatting options (Reference link)

Remarks: Formatting options include the ones described here

keyword.name: ToText
keyword.desc:
Returns a text representation of this numeric value, and accepts formatting options (Reference link)

Remarks: Formatting options include the ones described here

keyword.name: ToTitleCase
keyword.desc: Returns the text value of each element with every word's first letter in upper case. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToTitleCase
keyword.desc: Returns this string with every word's first letter in upper case. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToTitleCase
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value with every word's first letter in upper case. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToUpper
keyword.desc: Returns the text value of each element converted to 'UPPERCASE'. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToUpper
keyword.desc: Returns this string converted to 'UPPERCASE'. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToUpper
keyword.desc: Returns this numeric value converted to 'UPPERCASE'. (Reference link)

keyword.name: ToUpperFirstChar
keyword.desc:
Returns the text value of each element with the first letter in upper case. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will not capitalize a lower case first letter in a string containing an uppercase second letter, such as iPhone.

keyword.name: ToUpperFirstChar
keyword.desc:
Returns this string with the first letter in upper case. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will not capitalize a lower case first letter in a string containing an uppercase second letter, such as iPhone.

keyword.name: ToUpperFirstChar
keyword.desc:
Returns this numeric value with the first letter in upper case. (Reference link)

Remarks: This will not capitalize a lower case first letter in a string containing an uppercase second letter, such as iPhone.

keyword.name: Unit
keyword.desc:
Returns the unit of this attribute, if any. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a unit.

keyword.name: Unit
keyword.desc:
Returns the unit of this multi-valued attribute, if any. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a unit.

keyword.name: Unit
keyword.desc:
Returns the unit of this repeating attribute, if any. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a unit.

keyword.name: UnitUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns the unit of this attribute, if any, in US metrics. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a unit in US metrics.

keyword.name: UnitUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns the unit of this multi-valued attribute, if any, in US metrics. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a unit in US metrics.

keyword.name: UnitUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns the unit of this repeating attribute, if any, in US metrics. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a unit in US metrics.

keyword.name: Url
keyword.desc: Returns the Unified Resource Locator link to the source of this content. (Reference link)

keyword.name: UserManual
keyword.desc: Returns the manufacturer's user manual for this product. (Reference link)

keyword.name: UseSeparators
keyword.desc:
Replaces the counting separator ¬ with the specified respective separator (Reference link)

Remarks: You may specify only the first few separators and whitespace will automatically be used for the remaining values, you can also specify no separators, and whitespace will be used for all values.

keyword.name: Value
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Value
keyword.desc:
Returns the value of this attribute (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a value.

keyword.name: Value
keyword.desc:
Returns the value of this multi-valued attribute (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a value.

keyword.name: Value
keyword.desc:
Returns the value of this repeating attribute (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a value.

keyword.name: Values
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Values
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Values
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Values
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the values in this attribute grouping. (Reference link)

Remarks: Values are separated by ¬ according to their index, i.e. value1¬value2¬¬value3

keyword.name: Values
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the values in this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: In case of numeric attributes, it returns a list of decimals, use .ValuesWithUnits for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: Values
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the values in this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: In case of numeric attributes, it returns a list of decimals, use .ValuesWithUnits for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValuesAndUnits
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the values together with units in this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: In case of numeric attributes, it returns a list of decimals, use .ValuesWithUnits for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValuesAndUnits
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the values together with units in this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: In case of numeric attributes, it returns a list of decimals, use .ValuesWithUnits for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValuesAndUnitsUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the USM values together with units in this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: In case of numeric attributes, it returns a list of decimals, use .ValuesWithUnits for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValuesAndUnitsUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the USM values together with units in this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: In case of numeric attributes, it returns a list of decimals, use .ValuesWithUnits for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValuesUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the USM values in this attribute grouping. (Reference link)

Remarks: Values are separated by ¬ according to their index, i.e. value1¬value2¬¬value3

keyword.name: ValuesUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the USM values in this multi-valued attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use .ValuesWithUnitsUsm for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValuesUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns an ExpressionResultList object containing all the USM values in this repeating attribute. (Reference link)

Remarks: Use .ValuesWithUnitsUsm for a list of text containing units

keyword.name: ValueUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns the value of this attribute in US metrics. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a value in US metrics.

keyword.name: ValueUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns the value of this attribute in US metrics. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a value in US metrics.

keyword.name: ValueUSM
keyword.desc:
Returns the value of this attribute in US metrics. (Reference link)

Remarks: Prefer this when exporting a value in US metrics.

keyword.name: Weight
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: WHEN
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: Where
keyword.desc:
Returns a new list with all the elements from this list that match any the specified pattern(s). (Reference link)

Remarks: Pattern accepts % wildcards.

keyword.name: Where
keyword.desc:
Returns a subset of the values in this multi-valued attribute containing only the ones whose english values directly match one of the specified patterns. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: Where
keyword.desc:
Returns a subset of the values in this repeating attribute containing only the ones whose english values directly match one of the specified patterns. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereCategory
keyword.desc:
Filter these related products for products of the specified category. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports both category code and category key.

keyword.name: WhereManufacturer
keyword.desc:
Filter these related products for products whose manufacturer's names match the specified pattern. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereModelName
keyword.desc:
Filter these related products for products whose model names match the specified pattern. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereNot
keyword.desc:
Returns a new list with all the elements from this that do not match any the specified pattern(s). (Reference link)

Remarks: Pattern accepts % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereNot
keyword.desc:
Returns a subset of the values in this multi-valued attribute containing only the ones whose english values do NOT match one of the specified patterns. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereNot
keyword.desc:
Returns a subset of the values in this repeating attribute containing only the ones whose english values do NOT match one of the specified patterns. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereProductLine
keyword.desc:
Filter these related products for products whose product lines match the specified pattern. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards.

keyword.name: WhereUnit
keyword.desc:
Returns a subset of the values in this repeating attribute containing only the ones where the units match one of the specified patterns. (Reference link)

Remarks: Supports % wildcards. This is NOT supported by multi-valued attributes.

keyword.name: WhereUnitOrValue
keyword.desc:
Returns a subset of the values in this repeating attribute containing only the ones that either directly or indirectly (via units) match one of the specified patterns. (Reference link)

Remarks: Ask Luis if you think you need to use this. Supports % wildcards. This is NOT supported by multi-valued attributes.

keyword.name: Width
keyword.desc: Empty description.

keyword.name: XmlContent
keyword.desc:
Returns this content in raw XML form. (Reference link)

Remarks: Only works for MIME type "application/xml".

keyword.name: Year
keyword.desc: Empty description.
